SHORTTITLE  Bjorn Poonen: Mordell-Weil groups, Selmer groups, and Shafarevich-Tate groups

  • Poonen's lectures at the Winter School were on background material, but two (or more) of the papers on his web site are relelvant to the topic:
    • “Algebraic families of nonzero elements of Shafarevich-Tate groups”, with Colliot-Thélène: pdf
    • “Computational aspects of curves of genus at least 2”: ps, pdf
  • “The Mordell-Weil group of a genus 2 Jacobian”: project description
